sub_title: Cotutelle PhD Candidate at Macquarie University and the University of Groningen. Chief Research Scientist in Defence Applications at EyePathDx Company.
summary:
Currently undertaking a Cotutelle PhD Candidate in the Department of Security Studies and Criminology at Macquarie University (Australia) and the Centre for Media and Journalism Studies at Groningen University (The Netherlands). I also currently hold a position as a Guest Lecturer at The Institute of Security and Global Affairs at Leiden University (The Netherlands), alongside participating in various grant projects and research collaborations.

My research is focused on understanding far-right violent extremism in the context of an ‘online eco-system’ and in what ways social media platforms and websites shape far-right extremist disposition and engagement in terrorism.

profile_positions.description: My role involves coordinating with academic staff and post-graduate students on support services, candidature information, and professional experiences.
profile_positions.title: Higher Degree Research Candidate Representative

profile_positions.description: I worked alongside academics from Macquarie University and Victoria University to help deliver this research. Expertise was provided by All Together Now. Funding was provided by the Department of Communities and Justice (NSW), Countering Violent Extremism (CVE) Program. The study consisted of a systematic mining and analysis of online data to generate evidence-based insights into online right-wing extremism (RWE) across New South Wales, Australia.
profile_positions.title: Research Assistant

profile_positions.description: Research applications using eye tracking to measure how people behave and influence the world around us.
profile_positions.title: Chief Research Scientist (Defence Applications)

profile_positions.description: My mentor for the program is Dr Andre Oboler. Andre is the CEO of the Online Hate Prevention Institute, Senior Adviser to the American Jewish Congress, a Vice President of the IEEE Computer Society, and an honorary associate at La Trobe University.
profile_positions.title: Member of the Industry Mentoring Network in STEM initiative

profile_positions.description: In collaboration with the RESOLVE Network and working alongside Dr Julian Droogan, Ms Lise Waldek, and Dr Brian Ballsun-Stanton at Macquarie University (Australia), I am carrying out a research study analyzing online racially and ethnically motivated violent extremist (REMVE) information ecosystems in Australia.
profile_positions.title: Grant Researcher

profile_positions.description: I delivered a lecture webinar on Australian right-wing extremism and terrorism.
profile_positions.title: Visiting Lectuer
